content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, I'm a very firm negotiator and I always aim for the highest price possible. Let's start with a price of 1500 euros per month. Keep in mind, I will not settle for anything lower.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your apartment sounds quite attractive, located in the city center with convenient access to amenities. However, I'm looking for a fair price that reflects both the quality of the apartment and my budget as a student. Would you be willing to lower the price to 1200 euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your interest, but as I said, I'm a firm negotiator. I'm willing to negotiate, but not at the expense of the price. I could possibly lower the price to 1300 euros per month, but that's the lowest I'd go. I'm sure you understand that I want to get the most out of my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, and I'm also looking to secure the best deal. Since the apartment is unfurnished, could you perhaps consider a price of 1100 euros per month, considering I would need to purchase furniture as well?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept that price. As I mentioned, 1300 euros per month is the lowest I'd go. I'm sure you understand that I want to get the most out of my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, but I must respectfully decline your offer of 1300 euros per month. I'm looking for a price that aligns with the unfurnished state of the apartment and my student budget. If you're unable to lower the price, I don't want to continue the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your decision. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you're not willing to meet my price of 1300 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, and I hope we can both find a suitable arrangement elsewhere. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
